dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Lali-doubtless you've already guessed-ho, but another recording device has arrived from Konogg. Here.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Far as I can tell, he's sending them at regular intervals. What could the boy be up to?

dialogue.name: GLAGG
dialogue.text: Hmph, I could ask you the same. What devious scheme are you plottin'?

dialogue.name: GLAGG
dialogue.text: Well, whatever it is, you won't succeed! This is my village, and I'm not lettin' you have your way with it!

dialogue.name: GLAGG
dialogue.text: ...Huh? Why did I say that? Why did I feel so angry? F-Forget I said anything...

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: As you can see, Glagg's still behaving strangely.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: When I tried talking to him earlier, he all but told me to bugger off. On the face of it, you'd assume he takes exception to what I did at the meeting, but this is a little too strange...

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: At any rate, this is my problem to deal with, not yours. You just focus on doing your part for the cause, eh?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You obtain a message from Konogg.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The message can be viewed in your Portable Archive, which is available under Collection in the Duty section of the main menu.
